mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM track_team_member WHERE track_team_id = #{teamId} AND role = 'LEADER'
mapper.update: UPDATE track_team_member SET role = CASE WHEN user_id = #{newLeaderId} THEN 'LEADER' WHEN role = 'LEADER' THEN 'MEMBER' END, created_at = NOW() WHERE track_team_id = #{teamId} AND user_id IN (#{oldLeaderId}, #{newLeaderId})
UPDATE track_team SET is_completed = #{isCompleted}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{teamId}
